title: Jim Jones and Maino Join the Show
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss how the Celtics defense will fare against the Warriors superior ball movement and shooting. Jalen reveals which of Golden State’s weaker defenders will get picked on by Boston. Plus – go behind the curtain with Jalen as he explains what players for both teams are doing in these days leading up to the first game of the Finals. And – Draymond Green and Kevin Durant are going to have to agree to disagree…again. Draymond’s motivation for his comments is discussed. Also – don’t miss Jalen and Jacoby’s conversation with hip-hop stars Jim Jones and Maino, whose latest project LOBBY BOYZ dropped just last week.
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
